Name: Average time from SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Total time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to occur after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average duration of the SW-Awaiting AE Assignment phase until the next activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-EIC Reject)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in SW-Awaiting AE Assignment before transitioning to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants that include both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-EIC Reject in rejection-only variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, compared with the elapsed time to SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where reviewer assignment eventually occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment when followed by a successful reviewer agreement (SW-Reviewer Agreed) versus when followed by an immediate editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Reject)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that proceed to revision cycles (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision) versus those that end early
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the end of the case

Name: Time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the first occurrence of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-AE Assign Reviewers, specifically in complex variants involving multiple reviewer invitations and reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time required to exit the SW-Awaiting AE Assignment state in high-performance variants (e.g., frequency â‰¥ 3) versus low-performance variants (frequency = 1)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time from manuscript export (Manuscript Export Succeeded) to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, contextualized against the time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'
